hey everyone,

i haven't been on in awhile but i just got started again working on 
my rabbit/wolf simulator. i was looking through christian's matlab 
code for the xor experiment and i noticed that he tracks the 
innovations by generation. however, since my simulator is designed to 
be continuous, there is no real "generations". i was wondering if 
anyone had any advice on how else to keep track of the innovations. 
maybe by year? i dont know. any help would be appreciated. thanks

-timmy
